title: Project Metadata
description: Generated from 02-dictionary/artifacts/project_metadata.md. Showrunner's project configuration established during initialization and updated throughout project lifecycle. Drives creative decisions across all roles.

title.description: Project title. Used in exports, front matter, cover art. Can be provisional during init; refined later.

genre.description: Primary genre or theme. Guides tone, style conventions, art direction.

author.description: Author name. Appears in front matter, EPUB metadata, cover art. Full name or pseudonym; 'Anonymous' if deferred.

license.description: Content license. Appears in front matter, EPUB rights metadata, copyright page.

description.description: Brief project description (1-3 sentences). Used in EPUB metadata, HTML meta tags. If missing, Book Binder extracts first 2-3 sentences of manuscript prose.

subjects.description: Genre keywords/tags. Used in EPUB <dc:subject>, HTML meta keywords. If missing, extracted from genre + prose analysis.

language.description: Primary language code (ISO 639-1). Used in EPUB <dc:language>, HTML lang attribute.

target_sections.description: Target number of manuscript sections. Guides Plotwright scope planning.

target_length.description: Human-readable length category. Derived from target_sections.

branching_style.description: Narrative branching complexity. Guides Plotwright topology decisions.

style.description: Style/tone specifications established during Showrunner init or Style Lead stabilization.

paragraph_density.description: Paragraph density: sparse (1-2 paras), moderate (2-3), rich (3-4+).

pov.description: Point of view for the narrative.

last_modified.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last metadata update.

version.description: Project version. Semantic versioning (semver) or date-based.
